```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## built postAAR_subroutine.so for your system

R CMD SHLIB postAAR_subroutine.f

## load libraries data.table and spatstat
library(data.table)
library(spatstat)

## Simulatie point patterns

pp<-simrect(0,200,200,2,5,0.4,70,500,3,4)
plot(pp$points)

## add the simulated houses to the plot

plot(pp$lines, add=TRUE)

## extract the coordinates

pp_coords<-coords(pp$points)
str(pp_coords)

## Then fuel it into PostAAR with minimum distance = 2, maximum distance = 5 and tolerance = 1

pa<-postAAR(pp_coords$x,pp_coords$y,2,5,1)

## plot the rectangles
plot(pa$lines)

## plot the points
plot(pa$points)

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
